review.description: Then again, with this quite complex behavior, I find we're having to trigger it manually if it's not possible to implement something sane. Now, coming back to the confusing configuration of agent decoding tools, what I like to help with is the following. What feature should I use for implementing this? Should I create a /command? Should I use a sub-agent or just a regular agent? Should I modify some prompts? Should this be part of the agents.md file in a repository? Should I use the new skills? I have no idea. I should also mention I'm using open code.
